sentences: Delegates adopted the draft conclusions on greenhouse gas (GHG) inventory data (FCCC/SBI/1999/L.9), on the reporting guidelines referred to it by SBSTA (FCCC/SBI/1999/CRP.8) and on guidelines for the technical review of GHG inventories (FCCC/SBI/1999/CRP.9).
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
